nodes.text: David West Reynolds was a captain in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin he wrote a brief manual outlining the virtues of the TIE/LN starfighter.
TIE Fighter: A Pocket Manual is written as an in-universe document, and author David West Reynolds cast himself as the book's heavily biased Imperial author.
